# UISwitch.Style

**Enumeration**

Styles that determine the appearance of the switch.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Styles

- **UISwitch.Style.automatic**: A style indicating that the system chooses the appearance of the switch according to the current user interface idiom.
- **UISwitch.Style.checkbox**: A style indicating that the switch appears as a Mac-style checkbox.
- **UISwitch.Style.sliding**: A style indicating that the switch appears as an on/off slider.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Setting the display style

- **Displaying a checkbox in your Mac app built with Mac Catalyst**: Present a switch control as a Mac-style checkbox when your app runs in the Mac user interface idiom.
- **preferredStyle**: The preferred display style for the switch.
- **style**: The display style for the switch.
- **title**: The title displayed next to a checkbox-style switch.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
